name: claude-serverless
description: Serverless chat application with Claude 3.5 Sonnet

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd frontend && npm run dev" "cd backend && npm run dev"
scripts.deploy:all: npm run deploy:infra && npm run deploy:backend && npm run deploy:frontend
scripts.lint: cd frontend && npm run lint && cd ../backend && npm run lint
scripts.test: cd frontend && npm run test && cd ../backend && npm run test
